name: Ch12BBaseConvo5
_source: speak;Amelia;Do you think... Grado will ever return to how it was?|Before all of this happened?
speak;Cormag;It won't be easy.|Much has been destroyed, and many have been lost.
speak;Amelia;I know...|My village was one of the first to fall.
speak;Cormag;But the people of Grado are strong.|We've weathered hardships before.
speak;Amelia;You're right.|Once this war is over, we'll rebuild together!
speak;Cormag;Yes. It will take time, but it can be done.
speak;Amelia;What about you, Cormag?|What will you do when the fighting is finished?
speak;Cormag;I've been giving that some thought lately.|One thing I'm considering is returning to the wyvern valleys.
speak;Cormag;Yes. The wild wyverns of Grado need protection.|And the hatchlings will need guidance to grow strong.
speak;Amelia;I see...|So you'd be raising the next generation of wyverns?
speak;Cormag;That's part of it.|Genarog would appreciate the company of his own kind again.
speak;Amelia;Genarog is your wyvern, right?|He seems very loyal to you.
speak;Cormag;We've been through much together.|More than just a mount, he's been my closest companion.
speak;Cormag;A wyvern stone.|They're incredibly rare – formed from crystallized dragon breath.|Only the most bonded wyverns willingly part with them.
speak;Cormag;It's my duty to repay Genarog for his generosity.|Helping raise the next generation of wyverns seems fitting.
speak;Amelia;Wait a moment...|This might sound strange, but...
speak;Amelia;The stone set in my lance...|It looks very similar to what you're describing.
speak;Cormag;...This is remarkable.|Amelia, do you know what you have here?
speak;Amelia;I found it while training one day.|It seemed to glow whenever I practiced near the wyvern stables.
speak;Cormag;This is definitely a wyvern stone.|And a thunder elemental one at that.|They're even rarer than mine.
speak;Cormag;A wyvern stone bonds its carrier to the dragons.|With this, you could potentially fuse with a wyvern, just as I can with Genarog.
speak;Amelia;F-fuse?|You mean... become one with a wyvern?
speak;Cormag;In a manner of speaking, yes.|The stone has chosen you, Amelia.|It's an honor few receive.
speak;Amelia;I've always felt drawn to the wyverns...|Even as a child, I wasn't afraid of them like the other villagers.
speak;Cormag;That explains it.|The stone recognized that affinity within you.
speak;Amelia;After the war...|Maybe I could join you in the wyvern valleys?|I want to learn more about this connection.
speak;Amelia;Then it's decided!|Once we restore peace to Grado, we'll help restore the wyverns too!
